Description:
Properly use and store materials as per manufacturers' specifications.
Maintain and store cleaning materials for guest rooms, and use them according to the manufacturer's specifications.
Evaluate the cleaning supplies, room maintenance guidelines, and customer comfort levels and inform any complications to the supervisor.
Handle cleaning responsibilities for guest rooms of the premise according to the rules of the hotel/resort and maintain associated guidelines.Skills
Skills:
Proven work experience as a housekeeper.
The ability to work in a team, communicate, understand, and coordinate effectively to execute daily housekeeping responsibilities.
Experienced in executive housekeeping duties to satisfy customers and adhere to the standard quality and hospitality regulations of the premises.
Excellent customer service abilities to satisfy guests and ensure their comfort while abiding by standard rules and regulations.
